verses.verse: When I would have healed <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, then the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> was discovered <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of SHomron <S%H8111><s%>: for they commit <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8804><s%> falsehood <S%H8267><s%>; and the thief <S%H1590><s%> cometh in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the troop <S%H1416><s%> of robbers spoileth <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8804><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>.

And they consider <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not in their hearts <S%H3824><s%> that I remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all their wickedness <S%H7451><s%>: now their own doings <S%H4611><s%> have beset them about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; they are before my face <S%H6440><s%>.
They make the king <S%H4428><s%> glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with their wickedness <S%H7451><s%>, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> with their lies <S%H3585><s%>.

They are all adulterers <S%H5003><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, as an oven <S%H8574><s%> heated <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by the baker <S%H644><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, who ceaseht <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from raising <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8800><s%> after he hath kneaded <S%H3888><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the dough <S%H1217><s%>, until it be leavened <S%H2556><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

In the day <S%H3117><s%> of our king <S%H4428><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> have made him sick <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with bottles <S%H2534><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%>; he stretched out <S%H4900><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> with scorners <S%H3945><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

For they have made ready <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> like an oven <S%H8574><s%>, whiles they lie in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: their baker <S%H644><s%> <S%H8802><s%> sleepeth <S%H3463><s%> all the night <S%H3915><s%>; in the morning <S%H1242><s%> it burneth <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8802><s%> as a flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>.

They are all hot <S%H2552><s%> <S%H8735><s%> as an oven <S%H8574><s%>, and have devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; all their kings <S%H4428><s%> are fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: there is none among them that calleth <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto me.
Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, he hath mixed <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8704><s%> himself among the people <S%H5971><s%>; Efrayim <S%H669><s%> is a cake <S%H5692><s%> not turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.

Strangers <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> have devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his strength <S%H3581><s%>, and he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it not: yea, gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> are here and there <S%H2236><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon him, yet he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not.

And the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> testifieth <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to his face <S%H6440><s%>: and they do not return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%> their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, nor seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him for all this.

Efrayim <S%H669><s%> also is like a silly <S%H6601><s%> <S%H8802><s%> dove <S%H3123><s%> without heart <S%H3820><s%>: they call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, they go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Ashur <S%H804><s%>.

When they shall go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my net <S%H7568><s%> upon them; I will bring them down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> as the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%>; I will chastise <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, as their congregation <S%H5712><s%> hath heard <S%H8088><s%>.

Woe <S%H188><s%> unto them! for they have fled <S%H5074><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from me: destruction <S%H7701><s%> unto them! because they have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against me: though I have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, yet they have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> against me.

And they have not cried <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me with their heart <S%H3820><s%>, when they howled <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon their beds <S%H4904><s%>: they assemble <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8709><s%> themselves for corn <S%H1715><s%> and wine <S%H8492><s%>, and they rebel <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against me.

Though I have bound <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8765><s%> and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their arms <S%H2220><s%>, yet do they imagine <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8762><s%> mischief <S%H7451><s%> against me.

They return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, but not to Ha `Elyon <S%H5920><s%>: they are like a deceitful <S%H7423><s%> bow <S%H7198><s%>: their princes <S%H8269><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> for the rage <S%H2195><s%> of their tongue <S%H3956><s%>: this <S%H2097><s%> shall be their derision <S%H3933><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
